name: Strutting Turkey
originalText:
When this creature enters the battlefield,
exile target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard. If it has augment, combine it with a host you control. Otherwise, put it onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: Cards with no mana costs (including cards with augment) have a converted mana cost of 0.
If you exile a card with augment but don’t control a host, the card with augment stays in exile. It won’t enter the battlefield.

text:
